ygData.subject: Re: Najena
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t know of anyone who isn t kos by default in najena and i ve never seen a positive faction adjustment for najena. the knight is in drelzna s room and
ygData.messageBody:
i don't know of anyone who isn't kos by default in najena and i've never
seen a positive faction adjustment for najena.

the knight is in drelzna's room and thankfully he doesn't help her anymore.
you will have to clear the room before you can speak to him in peace.

kg


>From: Rich Hitz <rich.hitz@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] Najena
>Date: Tue, 02 Nov 1999 14:09:51 -0700
>
>Something just occured to me about Najena. One of the NPCs that makes the
>SK only armor is in Najena, right? While this may not be a big deal now,
>and I may already have messed this faction to Thule and back anyway, it
>makes me edgy. I have only been in there a few times, and killed 1 Ogre
>that
>wandered near the Magician and her 2 Earth Elemental pets. I noticed a
>Najena Residents -Faction adjusment. After that, My group attacked the
>Magician, and I became a stain on the floor.
>
>I am curious to know for those of you who battle there often, what faction
>adjustments you may have seen since they implemented Darkforge Armor. It
>will suck to destroy my faction with the only NPC that makes those pieces
>of
>the armor that only I can wear. Granted, what you destroyed, you can fix
>(hopefully), but that in and of itself can take a lifetime. Or is there no
>faction adjustment with this NPC?
>
>Also, what is the name of this NPC in Najena, and where does he spawn?
>
>I ask these questions as my guild is planning to raid Najena and get some
>nifty stuff. Am I about to become screwed when all is said and done?
>Any and all information on this is helpful and wanted.
>
>Thanks.
>
>--
>Akenar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
>15th Season TSK (and 1 more kill from 16th! AGAIN!)
>Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
>Bertoxx
>
>
>
